FFXIVTexTools2.log:
Application: - Guest update by Sel/Lunaretic [https://github.com/Lunaretic] & Upierczi/LuckyRed [https://github.com/LuckyRed] - Moved the searchbox to the top, and changed the search image for better usability. - Added an error catch when a directory that no longer exists is accessed. - Added an error catch when a texture is attempted to be imported, but it doesn't exist. - Added import warning when some Mesh Parts contain UV2 Data, but others do not.
Bug Fixes: - Fixed an issue where "Save All DDS" would crash when exporting items with icons. - Fixed a bug where "Check For Problems" would crash with LOD enabled. - Fixed crash on closing Modlist with no item open. (Thanks Liinko) - Fixed crash when importing certain Hair Models with more complex LoD1 models than LoD0 models. (Thanks Myopicat) - Fixed dummy mesh parts being added to pad out mesh groups unnecessarily. (Thanks Alexstrasza) - Fixed an error where 'Use Original Bones' would throw unnecessary warnings when used on faces.
For previous changelogs check the Change Log section of the website.
